Class CustomerService

  • java.lang.Object

public class CustomerService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for managing CRUD actions on Customers

      • getCustomer

        public Customer getCustomer(java.lang.String email)
        Get specific customer by email
        Parameters:
        email - email address of the customer
        Returns:
        Customer by the given email or null if no customers has this email

        Returns:

      • createCustomer

        public Customer createCustomer(Customer customer)
        Create new customer
        Parameters:
        customer - new customer to be created
        Returns:
        The persistence customer or null if a customer with the same email already exists

      • removeCustomer

        public boolean removeCustomer(java.lang.Long customerId)
        Remove customer from the repository
        Parameters:
        customerId - the id of the customer
        Returns:
        true if the customer is removed, false if no customer with the given id exists
